article_text:
It’s urgent that the United States slow the pumping of greenhouse gases into the atmosphere

This is not a liberal or conservative issue – it’s a do or die issue

The EPA plan is beneficial without being draconian

article_metadata.news-keywords: EPA Clean Power Plan, coal-burning plants, Gov. Pat McCrory, global warming, NC, renewable energy
article_metadata.description: NC is wrong to oppose EPA rules that will reduce power plant carbon emissions and cut smog-related illness.
article_metadata.title: EPA’s Clean Power Plan promotes the health of people and the planet | News & Observer
